00013 DistanceFunction::DistanceFunction(const StateVariables &scale):
00014   m_scale(scale)
00015 {}
00016 
00017 double DistanceFunction::operator()(const StateVectorRef &x,
00018                                     const StateVectorRef &y) const
00019 {
00020   assert(x && y);
00021   double dd = 0.0;
00022   StateVariables::const_iterator i;
00023   for (i = m_scale.begin(); i != m_scale.end(); ++i) {
00024     const unsigned index = i->first;
00025     const double scale = i->second;
00026     assert(x->size() > index && y->size() > index);
00027     const double d = scale * ((*y)[index] - (*x)[index]);
00028     dd += d*d;
00029   }
00030   return std::sqrt(dd);
00031 }

00033 AbstractStateComparator::
00034 AbstractStateComparator(const StateVariables &dimensions):
00035   m_dimensions(dimensions)
00036 {}
00037 
00038 bool AbstractStateComparator::
00039 operator()(const StateVectorRef &x, const StateVectorRef &y) const
00040 {
00041   StateVariables::const_iterator i;
00042   for (i = m_dimensions.begin(); i != m_dimensions.end(); ++i) {
00043     const unsigned index = i->first;
00044     assert(x->size() > index && y->size() > index);
00045     const double a = (*x)[index];
00046     const double b = (*y)[index];
00047     if (a < b)
00048       return true;
00049     if (a > b)
00050       return false;
00051   }
00052   return false;
00053 }

00150 bool GoalStatePredicate::operator()(const StateVectorRef &x) const
00151 {
00152   std::map<size_t, double>::const_iterator i;
00153   for (i = m_goal.begin(); i != m_goal.end(); ++i) {
00154     assert(i->first < x->size());
00155     if ((*x)[i->first] != i->second)
00156       return false;
00157   }
00158   return true;
00159 }

00161 void GoalStatePredicate::debug(std::ostream &out) const
